scripts.build: npm run compile && tsx for_each_package.ts run build
scripts.build_container_img: ${DOCKER_CMD:-podman} build . -f Dockerfile.test-repos -t commitrack-test-repos && tsx for_each_package.ts run build_container_img
scripts.lint: eslint *.ts *.mjs && prettier . --check && tsx for_each_package.ts run lint
scripts.format: eslint --fix *.ts *.mjs && prettier . --write && tsx for_each_package.ts run format
scripts.compile: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsx for_each_package.ts run compile
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start_test_containers && ./scripts/init_test_db.sh && node dist/api-server/index.js
